LanguageData.OrganUse_Abhorrent.label: totally abhorrent
LanguageData.OrganUse_Abhorrent.description: 생체 장기를 수확하고, 거래하고, 이식하는 것은 혐오스러운 죄악이다.
LanguageData.OrganUse_Acceptable.label: 수용함
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleNoSell.label: no harvest or sell
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleNoSell.description: Harvesting organs is a horrible thing. Selling any natural organ is pretty bad too. However, it's okay to buy and install them.
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleSellOK.label: no harvest
LanguageData.OrganUse_HorribleSellOK.description: Harvesting organs is a horrible thing. However, it's okay to buy, install, or sell them.
